basic_information.scholarship_name: Barbara Webster Endowed Scholarship in Political Science

description: The Barbara Webster Endowed Scholarship in Political Science honors Barbara Webster, a first-generation college student whose political science degree served her over her long career as a classroom teacher, guidance counselor, dance instructor, and arts administrator. The recipient will be a political science major with a GPA of at least 3.0; preference is given to a student with financial need. Eligibility Requirements  Undergraduate student  Declared Political Science major  Minimum 3.0 GPA  Preference will be given to a student demonstrating financial need

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
